description.short: Create instant surveys, collect feedback, and analyze results with AI-powered insights directly in Teams.
description.full: TeamPulse revolutionizes team feedback with instant survey creation, real-time response collection, and AI-powered analytics. Create professional surveys from templates (HR, Customer, Training, 360°), gather anonymous responses, and get intelligent insights - all without leaving Microsoft Teams. Features include: • Pre-built professional templates • Anonymous response collection • Real-time analytics with AI insights • Azure cloud storage • Enterprise-grade security • Easy integration with existing workflows. Trusted by organizations worldwide for streamlined feedback management.

commands.title: Create Survey
commands.description: Create a new survey with custom questions and options

commands.title: View Templates
commands.description: Browse professional survey templates (HR, Customer, Training, 360°)

commands.title: List Surveys
commands.description: View all created surveys and their status

commands.title: Survey Results
commands.description: View detailed results and analytics for any survey

commands.title: Help
commands.description: Get help with TeamPulse commands and features
